page.title: 14RELIGION NEAR HARDWICK
page.content: In this scattered area a small proportion of different denominations regularly attend a variety of places of worship.Anglicans attend their parish churches in Starston,Pulham Market & Pulham St.Mary.Methodists attend Pulham Market & Hempnall chapels.Long Stratton United Reformed church is used & a lay preacher & family go to Saxlingham Baptist chapel.R.C's travel further to Bungay & Long Stratton.Children attending Pulham Market chapel & Pulham St.Mary Sunday School have a wide variety of outings,sports,holiday clubs & gatherings as well as weekly Sunday School & family services. On Sept.7th the Norfolk Churches Trust organised its 3rd sponsored cycleride. From 10 am to 6pm on a sunny day cyclists of all ages visited churches & chapels to raise money for upkeep.
